creator: rossta7@yahoo.com
text: The attached patch allows one to compile 2.0.53 using zlib-1.2.2 in windows

creator: rossta7@yahoo.com
text:
Comment on attachment 14302
Superceeded

This patch is not correct

creator: rossta7@yahoo.com
text:
Created attachment 14304
Please use this patch

Please make sure the patch has DOS line endings, or the patch command will
fail.

creator: wrowe@apache.org
text:
httpd 2.0.44 and later are binary compatible, so no movement twords 1.2 zlib 
  should be expected.  On that note, httpd 2.1-dev and ultimately, 2.2 release
  already build on zlib 1.2 and no longer attempt to grab specific sources.
